game

Class AimingAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.AimingAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    public class AimingAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    A class which represents action to aim at a target.
    Author:
    Tan Wei Li

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Set the actor attribute to indicate it is aiming at a target.
      edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getNextActions()
      Based on the aim number, return the next corresponding AimingAction which has current aim number+1 and also SnippingAction which has specific miss chance and damage and return null if the aim number is zero or greater than 2
      java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
      Get a description string which describes the number of consecutive aiming at target.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AimingAction

        public AimingAction(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target,
                    LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle)
             throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructor. Specify the target and weapon used in AimingAction. aimNumber by default set as 1.
        Parameters:
        target - an Actor acts as target for aiming
        sniperRifle - a LongRangedWeapon used to aim at target
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if target or SniperRifle is null

      • AimingAction

        public AimingAction(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target,
                    LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle,
                    int aimNumber)
             throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor Specify the target, weapon and aimNumber for the AimingAction.
        Parameters:
        target - an Actor acts as target for aiming
        sniperRifle - a LongRangedWeapon used to aim at target
        aimNumber - an integer representing number of times of consecutive aiming
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if target, SniperRifle or aimNumber is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aimNumber is not 1 or 2

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Get a description string which describes the number of consecutive aiming at target.
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        a string which describe the aiming action (eg: "Player aims at Groan for the first time")
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor is null
        See Also:
        Action.menuDescription(Actor)

      • getNextActions

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getNextActions()
        Based on the aim number, return the next corresponding AimingAction which has current aim number+1 and also SnippingAction which has specific miss chance and damage and return null if the aim number is zero or greater than 2
        Returns:
        AimingAction which has current aim number +1 and SnippingAction which has specific miss chance and damage if the aim number is 1 or 2, else return null
